author: Tiberiu Oprea

comments.comment: Cannot use 'break' in forEach to escape loop, can be used in regular for iterator loop.
Can not use 'continue' in forEach to escape current iteration of loop, can be used in regular for iterator loop.

description: Covers some facts about forEach loops on arrays.

quotes.quote: There is no way to stop or break a forEach() loop other than by throwing an exception. - official MDN docs.
